problem.p: Let the random variable \(X\) be the sum of two fair six-sided die rolls.
Indicate a set by listing its elements in ascending order without spaces, enclosed in curly braces, e.g., {2,4}.

ul.li: How many possible events are there?
What is the highest probability of any value of \(X\)?
What is the lowest probability of any value of \(X\)?
What is the event \(E\) when \(X\) is a perfect square?
